comment.body:
> [kaffie](#comment_63_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Thanks. But I have no idea how to actually get this address into my wallet.

cat ZeroNet/data/users.json get the auth_privatekey, and import the key via electrum. worked for me :)

> [kaffie](#comment_64_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): The importing is the confusing part. I have the key. I'm using multibit on my mac.

try electrum. (https://download.electrum.org/3.3.4/electrum-3.3.4.dmg) multibit.org/help tells me, that importing "old" private keys is not supported - only their fancy format... :)

> [kaffie](#comment_65_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): That's working great, thanks!

awesome ^^ no problem
